oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Bobby Bare, Max T. Barnes, Mary Gauthier - 2017-10-14
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriters Bobby Bare, Max T. Barnes and Mary Gauthier from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 14, 2017.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bobby Bare; Max T. Barnes; Mary Gauthier;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments in progress by Ali Tonn and introduction of participants / (5:00) Opening comments by Bobby Bare / (06:45) Bobby and Mary introduce the song Mercy Now / (07:56) Performs the song Mercy Now (Mary Gauthier) / (13:43) Bobby and Mary talk about the previous song and the inspiration / (17:07) Bobby introduces next song / (18:49) Performs I Drink (Bobby Bare) / (23:19) Mary and Bobby talk about the previous song / (24:32) Max T. Barnes talks about Max D. Barnes, working in Bare's band and encouragement he got from Bare / (26:04) Max introduces the next song / (26:35) Performs Love, Me (Max T. Barnes) / (30:28) Performs brief excerpt of Look At Us (Max T. Barnes) / (31:06) Talks about the Songwriting with Soldiers program / 3(1:37) Performs Bullet Holes In The Sky (Mary Gauthier) / (35:45) Bare talks about his song God Bless America Again / (36:20) Bare talks about the song 500 Miles Away From Home / (37:27) Performs 500 Miles Away From Home (Bobby Bare) /

(41:06) Max talks about the next song / (42:12) Performs How Your Love Makes Me Feel (Max T. Barnes) / (45:15) Talk about the previous song / (45:40) Bare talks about the next song / (46:30) Performs Things Change (Bobby Bare) / (48:14) Final comments / (48:47) Walk-out music - (53:05) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bare, Bobby; Barnes, Max T.; Gauthier, Mary; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
